fields.name: Job Insecurity (Passive):
fields.value: Your role is revealed to everyone Day 1. You cannot be voted out.

fields.name: Your Job (Passive):
fields.value:
All other players have this ability
***Their Job****: You may send a technical, task, question, or complaint about MafiaTWOW to the HR department. HR must answer these questions, fulfill these tasks, and suggest ways to fix your complaint about MafiaTWOW to complete their wincon. The tasks and questions do not need to be related to MafiaTWOW. You can use this ability at anytime, along with another ability.*

fields.name: Redirect:
fields.value: Target a player. Redirect any attacks or negative abilities directed at you onto the targeted player to deal with.

fields.name: Reprehend (Locked, x1, 170% Charge):
fields.value: Target a player. That player is roleblocked and cannot talk (even in factional chats or HNs) for one round.

fields.name: Replace (1x):
fields.value: When a player DNPs, you may choose to kick them out of the game and replace them with another person.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: Successfully answer 75% of your given requests from Their Job or survive until the end of the game.
